message: Let's be fair, Bob. I know the money loses value fast, so let's settle this quickly.
Let's speed up the process, I've made a more reasonable offer.
I need a larger share to make this worthwhile, Bob. The clock is ticking.
Come on, Alice, we're running out of time! This is a fair deal considering the inflation.
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or leave it - we both lose if this drags on.
